column3: "Deals damage and slows the target. This is one cool spell"
"Increases agility. Also applies Greater Blessing of Speedy Gonzales"
"A powerful bow attack. Would make William Tell proud"
"Weakens and disorients the target. Use reponsibly"
"Forbidden lethargy magic that dramatically slows the target"
"Increase offensive capabilities of target. Invoked by chanting 'WORLD STAR'"
"Boosts max health temporarily. Banned by the Olympic committee"
"Improves concentration and mental power of target. Illegal in certain countries"
"Increases defense for a short time. Ineffective against emotional damage"
"Restores a downed target and gives some health. RISE FROM YOUR GRAVE"
